name: Machu Picchu
description: Machu Picchu is an ancient Incan city set high in the Andes Mountains in Peru. It's renowned for its well-preserved ruins, picturesque terraces, and stunning panoramic views.

name: Santorini, Greece
description: Santorini is a picturesque island in the Aegean Sea known for its whitewashed buildings, blue-domed churches, and breathtaking sunsets over the caldera.

name: Banff National Park
description: Banff National Park is located in the Canadian Rockies and offers stunning alpine scenery, turquoise lakes, and towering mountain peaks, making it a paradise for nature photographers.

name: Neuschwanstein Castle
description: Neuschwanstein Castle is a fairytale-like castle nestled in the Bavarian Alps of Germany. It's the inspiration for Disney's Sleeping Beauty Castle and offers breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape.

name: Kyoto, Japan
description: Kyoto is a city in Japan known for its well-preserved temples, traditional wooden houses, and stunning cherry blossoms in the spring. It's a paradise for photographers seeking to capture the essence of Japanese culture.

name: Grand Canyon
description: The Grand Canyon is a UNESCO World Heritage Site located in Arizona, USA. It's known for its vast expanse of layered rock formations, dramatic cliffs, and vibrant colors, providing endless opportunities for breathtaking photos.

name: Cinque Terre, Italy
description: Cinque Terre is a collection of five colorful coastal villages perched on the rugged cliffs of the Italian Riviera. With its charming streets, scenic vistas, and crystal-clear waters, it's a photographer's dream destination.

name: Antelope Canyon
description: Antelope Canyon is a slot canyon located in Arizona, USA, known for its mesmerizing sandstone formations, light beams that dance upon the walls, and vibrant colors that change throughout the day.

name: Bagan, Myanmar
description: Bagan is an ancient city in Myanmar known for its thousands of well-preserved Buddhist temples and pagodas, which create a stunning landscape best seen from a hot air balloon during sunrise or sunset.

name: Great Barrier Reef
description: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system, located off the coast of Queensland, Australia. It's home to an incredible diversity of marine life and offers unparalleled underwater photography opportunities.

name: Eiffel Tower, Paris
description: The Eiffel Tower is an iconic landmark in Paris, France. It offers stunning views of the city and is a must-visit for any photographer visiting Paris.

name: Yellowstone National Park, USA
description: Yellowstone National Park is a natural wonder with its geysers, hot springs, and diverse wildlife. It's a paradise for nature and wildlife photographers.

name: Taj Mahal, India
description: The Taj Mahal is a stunning white marble mausoleum in Agra, India. It's considered one of the most beautiful buildings in the world and is a great location for photography.

name: Venice, Italy
description: Venice is a city built on water, known for its canals, gondolas, and beautiful architecture. It offers unique photo opportunities that you won't find in any other city.

name: Great Wall of China
description: The Great Wall of China is a historic landmark that offers breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape. It's a challenging but rewarding location for photographers.

name: Northern Lights, Iceland
description: The Northern Lights, or Aurora Borealis, is a natural light display that occurs in high-latitude regions. Iceland is one of the best places to capture this phenomenon.

name: Mount Fuji, Japan
description: Mount Fuji is Japan's highest mountain and a popular subject in Japanese art. Its symmetrical shape and snow-capped peak make it a favorite among photographers.

name: Sahara Desert, Africa
description: The Sahara Desert offers vast sand dunes, unique rock formations, and a chance to capture the beauty of the desert landscape.

name: Sydney Opera House, Australia
description: The Sydney Opera House is one of the most famous and distinctive buildings in the world. Its unique architecture makes it a great location for photography.

name: Matterhorn, Switzerland
description: The Matterhorn is a famous mountain in the Swiss Alps, known for its distinctive pyramid shape. It's a popular location for landscape and adventure photography.

name: The Redwoods, California
description: Known as the largest trees in the world, these gentle giants are a must-see for any photographer travelling through California. These trees can be found along Northern Californiaâ€™s coast[^1^][5].

name: Yosemite National Park, California
description: Yosemite National Park offers some of the most incredible mountain scenery anywhere in California â€” complete with snow peaks, pine forest valleys and multicoloured skyscapes[^1^][5].

name: Golden Gate Bridge, San Francisco
description: The Golden Gate Bridge is one of the most photographed structures in the world. It offers sweeping views of San Francisco Bay[^1^][5].

name: Eastern Sierras, California
description: The Eastern Sierras are known for their stunning landscapes, making them a top location for landscape photography[^1^][5].

name: La Jolla, San Diego
description: La Jolla is a seaside area known for its rugged coastline. The views of the Pacific Ocean are breathtaking[^1^][5].

name: Big Sur, California
description: Big Sur is a rugged and mountainous section of the Central Coast of California between Carmel Highlands and San Simeon, where the Santa Lucia Mountains rise abruptly from the Pacific Ocean[^1^][5].

name: Malibu, California
description: Malibu is a city west of Los Angeles, California. Itâ€™s known for its celebrity homes and beaches, including wide and sandy Zuma Beach[^1^][5].

name: The Channel Islands, California
description: The Channel Islands are a chain of eight islands located in the Pacific Ocean off the coast of southern California along the Santa Barbara Channel in the United States[^1^][5].

name: Joshua Tree National Park, California
description: Joshua Tree National Park is a vast protected area in southern California. It's characterized by rugged rock formations and stark desert landscapes[^2^][7].

name: Ranchos Palos Verdes, California
description: Ranchos Palos Verdes is a city in Los Angeles County, California atop the Palos Verdes Hills and bluffs of the Palos Verdes Peninsula[^2^][7].

name: San Juan Capistrano, California
description: San Juan Capistrano has been the home to many generations of people, and it continues to represent the beauty of California[^2^][7].

name: The LOT
description: parking garage with urban vibes, modern and sleek architecture

name: Mines Rd
description: Long stretch of back-road along Livermore mountain side
